2018.title: Single Cell Expression Atlas
2018.description: The Single Cell Expression Atlas knowledge-base contains eligible single-cell and single-nucleus RNA-seq experiments from a range of diverse species, these data have been re-analysed by SCEA using standardised analysis pipeline and periodically updated against new Ensembl genome releases.

2018.title: TBtools
2018.description: TBtools is a Toolkit for Biologists integrating various biological data handling tools with a user-friendly interface.

2018.title: BioJava 5
2018.description: BioJava is an open-source project that provides a Java library for processing biological data.

2018.title: Squiggle
2018.description: Squiggle is a two-dimensional DNA sequence visualization library that can turn FASTA sequence files.

2018.title: bioSyntax
2018.description: bioSyntax makes data intuitive for scientists and helps to navigate and comprehend its significance by syntax highlighting.
